title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the foundations of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Advanced React with TypeScript
description: Build powerful React apps using TypeScript, Context, and Hooks.

title: Python for Data Analysis
description: Analyze and visualize data with Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Design intuitive interfaces with modern UX patterns.

title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Learn both frontend and backend using MERN stack.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Understand ML concepts and build simple models with Python.

title: DevOps Fundamentals
description: Explore CI/CD, Docker, and cloud deployment techniques.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Make mobile-friendly websites with Flexbox and Grid.

title: Database Design & SQL
description: Learn relational databases and how to query with SQL.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Understand how to protect systems and networks.
